title: Business Objectives
content:
The Business Objective feature enables you, portfolio managers, to create and manage business objectives in a single place. You can update and adjust the business objectives at any time even after they are saved and published. Proposals can leverage and are aligned with the business objectives that are created in the Business Objectives feature.

How to create a business objective

  1. From the main menu, select Plan > Idea & Proposal > Business Objectives. Service Management displays a list of business objectives.

  2. Click New. Service Management displays a New Business Objective dialog box to gather basic information. Service Management doesn't assign an ID until you save the business objective.

  3. Complete the following fields:

    Field Description
    Objective Enter the objective name.
    Description

    Enter a description that captures the details of the business objective.
    Active

    Select the check box if you want to make the business objective available for user selection.
    Driven by

    From the drop-down list, select the person that's responsible for driving the business objective.

  4. In Attachments, add any supporting files by clicking Add.

  5. Click Save when you are finished.

How to edit a business objective

  1. From the main menu, select Plan > Idea & Proposal > Business Objectives. Service Management displays a list of business objectives.

  2. Select the business objective that you want to edit.

    To filter the record list, click the Add filter button. For more information, see Filters.

  3. Click the business objective identifier in the Id column to display the selected record, or click Edit in the business objective preview.

  4. By default, the business objective is displayed with the General tab selected. Click the tab you want to edit or view:

    Tab Description
    General Displays general information about the selected idea. For more information about the General tab, see General tab.
    Discussions

    Displays any relevant conversations about the selected idea. For more information about discussions, see Discussions.
    History

    Displays changes to the selected idea. For more information about history, see History.
  5. Click Save when you are finished.

General tab

This tab includes the following sections:

Section Description
Business objective details Basic information about the business objective.
Attachments

Click Add attachment if you want to attach a file to the record.

Note

  • The supported attachment file formats and the maximum file size of an attachment are defined in the tenant's Application settings tab in Suite Administration.
  • If the Attachments field has been defined as encrypted for this record type and you are a member of an encryption domain, click Add encrypted attachments to attach an encrypted file to the record.
  • Attachments aren't visible in the Service Portal.

  • Business objective details

    Field Description
    Objective The name of the business objective.
    Description

    A description that captures the details of the business objective.
    Active

    Select this check box if the business objective is available for user selection.
    Driven by

    The user who is responsible for driving the business objective.
